election_record.label: New Hampshire 1816 Governor

overview.note: "Whole number of votes 39,055." Niles' Weekly Register (Baltimore, MD). June 29, 1816.

sub_unit.name: Claremont
sub_unit.note: William Plumer received 1 vote as Hon. William.

sub_unit.name: Colebrook
sub_unit.note: The votes from Colebrook were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Alexandria
sub_unit.note: The votes from Alexandria were rejected.

sub_unit.name: Littleton
sub_unit.note: The History of Littleton lists the Federal ticket with 120 votes.

sub_unit.name: Eaton
sub_unit.note: The votes from Eaton were rejected.

election_record.reference: Original Election Returns. New Hampshire Archives and Records Management, Concord.
